verses.text: Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w vial|strong="H6378"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \add it\add* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is it\add* not because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* thee \add to be\add* \w captain|strong="H5057"\w* over his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*?

When thou art \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* from \w me|strong="H5978"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, then thou shalt \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* by \w Rachel’s|strong="H7354"\w* \w sepulchre|strong="H6900"\w* in the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* at \w Zelzah|strong="H6766"\w*; and they will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, The \w asses|strong="H0860"\w* which thou \w wentest|strong="H1980"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* are \w found|strong="H4672"\w*: and, lo, thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* hath \w left|strong="H5203"\w* the \w care|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w*, and \w sorroweth|strong="H1672"\w* for you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?\f + \fr 10.2 \ft care: Heb. business\f*

Then shalt thou go \w on|strong="H2498"\w* \w forward|strong="H1973"\w* from thence, and thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w plain|strong="H0436"\w* of \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*, and there shall \w meet|strong="H4672"\w* thee \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* going \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w kids|strong="H1423"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3603"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* a \w bottle|strong="H5035"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*:

And they \w will|strong="H7592"\w* \w salute|strong="H7965"\w* thee, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add loaves\add* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*; which thou shalt \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 10.4 \ft salute…: Heb. ask thee of peace\f*

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* that thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, where \add is\add* the \w garrison|strong="H5333"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and it shall come to pass, when thou art come \w thither|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, that thou shalt \w meet|strong="H6293"\w* a \w company|strong="H2256"\w* of \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* coming \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* with a \w psaltery|strong="H5035"\w*, and a \w tabret|strong="H8596"\w*, and a \w pipe|strong="H2485"\w*, and a \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them; and they shall \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*:

And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w come|strong="H6743"\w* upon thee, and thou shalt \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* with them, and shalt be \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

And let it be, when these \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, \add that\add* thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as \w occasion|strong="H4672"\w* \w serve|strong="H3027"\w* thee; for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* with thee.\f + \fr 10.7 \ft And…: Heb. And it shall come to pass, that when these signs, etc\f*\f + \fr 10.7 \ft that…: Heb. do for thee as thine hand shall find\f*

And thou shalt go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*; and, behold, I will come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* unto thee, to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, \add and\add* to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*: \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shalt thou \w tarry|strong="H3176"\w*, till I \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to thee, and \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* thee what thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ And it was \add so\add*, that when he had \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* his \w back|strong="H7926"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* from \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w gave|strong="H2015"\w* him \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: and all those \w signs|strong="H0226"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to pass that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 10.9 \ft back: Heb. shoulder\f*\f + \fr 10.9 \ft gave: Heb. turned\f*

And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* thither to the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, behold, a \w company|strong="H2256"\w* of \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w met|strong="H7125"\w* him; and the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H6743"\w* upon him, and he \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

And it came to pass, when all that \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* him \w beforetime|strong="H0865"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that, behold, he \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* among the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, then the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, What \add is\add* this \add that\add* is come unto the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*? \add Is\add* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* also among the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*?\f + \fr 10.11 \ft one…: Heb. a man to his neighbour\f*

And \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the same place \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, But who \add is\add* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*? Therefore it became a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*, \add Is\add* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* also among the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*?\f + \fr 10.12 \ft of…: Heb. from thence\f*
And when he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w*, he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w*.

¶ And \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him and to his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Whither|strong="H0575"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* ye? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, To \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w*: and when we \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \add they were\add* no \w where|strong="H0369"\w*, we \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*.
And \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* me, I pray thee, what \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto you.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w*, He \w told|strong="H5046"\w* us \w plainly|strong="H5046"\w* that the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w* were \w found|strong="H4672"\w*. But of the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w*, whereof \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w*, he \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him not.
¶ And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w called|strong="H6817"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* together unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*;

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* you out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of all \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*, \add and\add* of them that \w oppressed|strong="H3905"\w* you:

And ye have this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, who himself \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* you out of all your \w adversities|strong="H7451"\w* and your \w tribulations|strong="H6869"\w*; and ye have \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Nay\add*, but \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over us. Now therefore \w present|strong="H3320"\w* yourselves \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* by your \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, and by your \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*.

And when \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* had caused all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to come \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

When he had caused the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* to come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Matri|strong="H4309"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*, and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* was \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: and when they \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* him, he could not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

Therefore they \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* further, if the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* should yet \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w thither|strong="H1988"\w*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, he hath \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* himself among the \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w*.

And they \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* and \w fetched|strong="H3947"\w* him thence: and when he \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he was \w higher|strong="H1361"\w* than any of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* from his \w shoulders|strong="H7926"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w* ye him whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, that \add there is\add* none like him among all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shouted|strong="H7321"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, God \w save|strong="H2421"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 10.24 \ft God…: Heb. Let the king live\f*

Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w*, and \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \add it\add* in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, and laid \add it\add* \w up|strong="H3240"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* also \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*; and there \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with him a band of \w men|strong="H2428"\w*, whose \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w touched|strong="H5060"\w*.

But the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How shall this man \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us? And they \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* him, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him no \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*. But he held his \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*.\f + \fr 10.27 \ft held…: or, was as though he had been deaf\f*
